title: Baker Hughes Total Rigs
description: Total Rigs in the United States increased to 779 in November 11 from 770 in the previous week. Total Rigs in the United States averaged 1510.63  from 1950 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 4530  in December of 1981 and a record low of 244  in August of 2020. US Total Rigs refer to the number of active US rigs drilling in a given week. This page includes a chart with historical data for the United States Total Rigs.
author: Baker Hughes Company
